update orders
ORDER_NO = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{record.serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFFF_SER_ITEM_ID = #{record.stafffSerItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STAFF_ID = #{record.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{record.orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT = #{record.orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_BALANCE = #{record.orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_DATE = #{record.depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{record.idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INTERVIEW = #{record.isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASS_VIEW_DATE = #{record.passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BALANCE_DATE = #{record.balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_LOCK = #{record.isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_ORDER_NO = #{record.reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{record.orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_MOBILE = #{record.memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_ORDER_NO = #{record.shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE_OVER = #{record.balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCLE_REASON = #{record.cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_published_job = #{record.isPublishedJob},
modify_time = now()

#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select a.ORDER_NO 'orderNo', a.ORDER_TIME 'orderTime', a.MEMBER_ID 'memberId', a.SERVICE_ITEM_CODE 'serviceItemCode', b.SERVICE_TYPE 'serviceType', a.ORDER_SOURCE 'orderSource', a.AMOUNT 'amount', a.ORDER_STATUS 'orderStatus', a.REMARK 'remark', a.SERVICE_CHARGE 'serviceCharge', a.CANCLE_REASON 'cancleReason', a.user_id 'userId', a.user_name 'userName', a.STAFF_ID 'staffId', a.TENANT_ID 'tenantId', a.is_published_job 'isPublishedJob', a.is_local_staff 'isLocalStaff', c.WEBSITE_NAME 'tenantsName', c.TENANTS_PHONE 'tenantsPhone', a.modify_time 'modifyTime', a.modify_account 'modifyAccount' from orders a, order_customers_info b , tenants_apps c where a.ORDER_NO = b.ORDER_NO AND a.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.TENANT_ID = c.TENANT_ID

SELECT ORDER_NO 'orderNo', ORDER_DEPOSIT 'orderDeposit', DEPOSIT_DATE 'depositDate', IDEPOSIT_OVER 'idepositOver', IS_INTERVIEW 'isInterview', PASS_VIEW_DATE 'passViewDate',
BALANCE_DATE 'balanceDate', BALANCE_OVER 'balanceOver', ORDER_BALANCE 'orderBalance' FROM orders WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT
FROM orders where staff_id=#{staffId} order by ORDER_TIME desc LIMIT 5

select
from orders where STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ORDER_STATUS = '04' AND ORDER_SOURCE NOT in('03') order by ORDER_TIME desc

SELECT ORDER_NO 'orderNo', a.STAFF_ID 'staffId', STAFF_NAME 'staffName', HEAD_IMAGE 'headImage', AGE 'age', ZODIAC 'zodiac', NATIVE_PLACE 'nativePlace', CONSTELLATION 'constellation', EDUCARION 'educarion', j.PRICE 'price', j.unit 'unit', WORK_STATUS 'workStatus', j.EXPERIENCE 'experience', b.SEX 'sex', (select group_concat(service_item_code) from tenants_staff_ser_items s where s.staff_id=a.staff_id and is_usable=1) 'serviceType' FROM orders a, tenants_staffs_info b, tenants_staff_job_info j WHERE a.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and b.staff_id = j.staff_id AND a.STAFF_ID = b.STAFF_ID

select
from orders where ORDER_STATUS = "01" and DATE_ADD(add_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY) < NOW()
mapper.update:
update orders
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INTERVIEW = #{isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE_OVER = #{balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_DATE = #{depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BALANCE_DATE = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update orders set ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = now() where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update orders set ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , modify_time = now() where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update orders set user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = now() where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
